Uses of Interface
jdraw.framework.DrawView

  • Packages that use DrawView 
    Package Description
    jdraw.framework
    Contains all interfaces and implementations of the base framework of the JDraw editor.
    jdraw.std
    Contains standard implementations of framework interfaces.

    • Uses of DrawView in jdraw.framework

      Methods in jdraw.framework that return DrawView 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawView DrawContext.getView()
      Returns the context's drawing view.
      Methods in jdraw.framework with parameters of type DrawView 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void FigureHandle.dragInteraction​(int x, int y, MouseEvent e, DrawView v)
      Tracks a step of a started interaction.
      void FigureHandle.startInteraction​(int x, int y, MouseEvent e, DrawView v)
      Tracks the start of an interaction.
      void FigureHandle.stopInteraction​(int x, int y, MouseEvent e, DrawView v)
      Tracks the end of a running interaction.

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  StdDrawView
      Standard implementation of interface DrawView.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DrawView AbstractContext.getView()  
      Constructors in jdraw.std with parameters of type DrawView 
      Constructor Description
      AbstractContext​(DrawView view)
      Constructs a standard context by creating and initializing a GUI.

      Constructs a standard context by creating and initializing a GUI.
      StdContext​(DrawView view)
      Constructs a standard context with a default set of drawing tools.
      StdContext​(DrawView view, List<DrawToolFactory> toolFactories)
      Constructs a standard context.
      StdSelectionTool​(DrawView aView, DrawContext aContext)
      This tool enables selection behavior in the given view.
